Self.Wiki: Determines the configuraiton of magic spells.

ezStateBehaviorType.Wiki: The magic school this spell belongs to.

refType.Wiki: The TimeAct offset used in the c0000 TAE to find the casting animations.

enable_multi.Wiki: If ON, then the spell can be used in multiplayer sessions.

enable_multi_only.Wiki: If ON, then the spell can be used in multiplayer sessions, but not in offline sessions.

iconId.Wiki: The numeric ID used for specifying which icon is used to display this spell in menus.

behaviorId.Wiki: The behavior parameter to use when this spell is triggered.

faithForGet.Wiki: The minimum amount of faith (FTH) this spell requires for a valid cast.

slotLength.Wiki: The number of spell equipment slots this spell occupies.

isEnchant.Wiki: If ON, this spell is considered a weapon enhancement spell.

sortId.Wiki: The numeric ID used for ordering each spell in menus.

basicValue.Wiki: The base price for this spell.

mtrlItemId.Wiki: The item (or items) that the spell costs in a shop that must be present before it can be purchased.

enable_live.Wiki: If ON, this spell can be used in a sessions where the player is the host.

enable_gray.Wiki: If ON, this spell can be used in a sessions where the player is a gray phantom.

enable_white.Wiki: If ON, this spell can be used in a sessions where the player is a white phantom.

enable_black.Wiki: If ON, this spell can be used in a sessions where the player is a black phantom.

yesNoDialogMessageId.Wiki: The text ID of to use for the 'Yes / No' dialog issued when this spell is used.

opmeMenuType.Wiki: The type of menu to display when the spell is used.

disableOffline.Wiki: If ON, this spell is disabled if the player is not in a multiplayer session.
